column4: ok, i've got an Intel Ethernet Pro 100 NIC that isn't working - dhclient fails with SIOCSIFFLAGS: Resource temporarily unavailable - any suggestions?
bring down the interface then bring it back up at look at the output of dmesg
thanks
bringing it up shows the same error, nothing happens in dmesg
so ifconfig ethX down && ifconfig ethX up says that?
using sudo
yeah
mmm
I also had this problem about a year ago, but I know the NIC works
dmesg|grep eth, does your nic show?
maybe the driver for it is not loaded for some reason
how did you fix it a year ago?
I didn't =/
dmesg|grep eth, does your nic show?
it does appear in dmesg
are you sure it's using the correct driver? sometimes, though seldom, a wrong driver gets loaded
i'm not sure if i'm using the correct driver.  what driver do you suggest I use?
i don't know the card ;)
lspci | grep Eth
00:0a.0 Ethernet controller: Intel Corporation 82557/8/9 [Ethernet Pro 100]  (rev 02)
gotta go for now, bbl
